trans-unit.source: Overview of Tasks to Set Up Purchasing | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Overview of Tasks to Set Up Purchasing | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Přehled úkonů pro nastavení nákupu | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Describes the tasks to define your company's procurement policies and set up your purchasing processes.

seg-source.mrk: Describes the tasks to define your company's procurement policies and set up your purchasing processes.

target.mrk: Popisuje úkony k definici zásad zadávání zakázek vaší společnosti a nastavuje nákupní procesy.

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up Purchasing

trans-unit.source: Before you can manage purchase processes, you must configure the rules and values that define the company's purchase policies.

seg-source.mrk: Before you can manage purchase processes, you must configure the rules and values that define the company's purchase policies.

target.mrk: Než budete moci spravovat nákupní procesy, musíte nakonfigurovat pravidla a hodnoty, které definují nákupní zásady společnosti.

trans-unit.source: You must define the general setup, such as which purchase documents are required and how their values are posted.

seg-source.mrk: You must define the general setup, such as which purchase documents are required and how their values are posted.

target.mrk: Musíte zadefinovat obecné nastavení, například jaké nákupní doklady jsou požadovány a jak jsou jejich hodnoty zveřejněny.

trans-unit.source: This general setup is typically performed once during the initial implementation.

seg-source.mrk: This general setup is typically performed once during the initial implementation.

target.mrk: Toto obecné nastavení se obvykle provádí jednou během počáteční implementace.

trans-unit.source: A separate series of tasks related to registering new vendors is to record any special price or discount agreements that you have with each vendor.

seg-source.mrk: A separate series of tasks related to registering new vendors is to record any special price or discount agreements that you have with each vendor.

target.mrk: Samostatnou řadou úkolů souvisejících s registrací nových dodavatelů je zaznamenávání jakýchkoli zvláštních cenových nebo slevových dohod, které máte s každým dodavatelem.

trans-unit.source: Finance-related purchase setup, such as payment methods and currencies, are covered in the Finance Setup section.

seg-source.mrk: Finance-related purchase setup, such as payment methods and currencies, are covered in the Finance Setup section.

target.mrk: Nastavení nákupu související s finančními prostředky, například platební metody a měny, je uvedeno v části Nastavení financí.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Setting Up Finance](finance-setup-finance.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Setting Up Finance](finance-setup-finance.md).
To
See

trans-unit.source: Create a vendor card for each vendor that you purchase from

seg-source.mrk: Create a vendor card for each vendor that you purchase from

target.mrk: Vytvořte kartu dodavatele pro každého dodavatele, od kterého nakupujete

seg-source.mrk: Register New Vendors

trans-unit.source: Enter the different discounts and special prices that vendors grant you depending on item, quantities, and/or date

seg-source.mrk: Enter the different discounts and special prices that vendors grant you depending on item, quantities, and/or date

target.mrk: Zadejte různé slevy a speciální ceny, které vám dodavatelé poskytují v závislosti na zboží, množství a/nebo datu.

seg-source.mrk: Record Purchase Price, Discount, and Payment Agreements

target.mrk: Zaznamenejte Nákupní cenu, Slevu a Platební smlouvy

seg-source.mrk: Prioritize vendors
Prioritize Vendors
Set up purchasers
Set Up Purchasers
